name: Rocket’s Scizor ex
author: Hikaru Koike

poke_body.name: Dual Armor
poke_body.effect: As long as Rocket’s Scizor ex has any {M} Energy attached to it, Rocket’s Scizor ex is both {D} and {M} type.

attacks.name: Rotating Claws
attacks.effect: You may discard an Energy card attached to Rocket’s Scizor ex. If you do, search your discard pile for an Energy card (excluding the one you discarded) and attach it to Rocket’s Scizor ex.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
